Instructions on how to use this app:

First click on Settings, fill out the information for your database and press on 'Update'.
If this is the first time you use this database, go back to the settings and click on 'Create tables for database' to prepare the database for usage.
Then click in the main menu on 'Create a new map' to create a new map, or on 'See an existing map' if you already created a map and want to see that map.
Then type in a new code for creating a new map or an existing code for seeing an existing map. Then click on 'Enter'.
That will bring you to the map.
You can navigate through the map by dragging it around. You can zoom in by double clicking. You can also zoom by double clicking and then holding the second click and then dragging back and forth to zoom in and out.
To mark a house on the map:
1) Type in the address and click on 'Enter'.
2) Select the color to mark the house with and click on 'Save'.
Repeat this to mark all the houses that you want to mark on the map. When you are finished, click on 'Submit' to store the changes in the database.
